Komentar Menpora dan PSSI Soal Aksi Lempar Botol Gubernur Kalteng
05 Nov 2019, 01:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tindakan kurang terpuji dilakukan Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah (Kalteng), Sugianto Sabran saat menonton pertandingan antara Kalteng Putra melawan Persib Bandung pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar di Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Jumat (1/11). Kala itu, dia melempar botol minuman ke arah lapangan.
Aksi tersebut dilakukan Sugianto karena kecewa dengan keputusan wasit Abdul Rahman Salasa yang memberikan kartu merah untuk pemain Kalteng Putra, Patrich Wanggai. Tak sampai di situ, Sugianto juga memarahi Kapolres Palangkaraya, AKBP Timbul Siregar karena memberikan teguran kepadanya setelah melempar botol.
Saat dimintai komentar mengenai tindakan Sugianto, Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora), Zainudin Amali, tak banyak bicara. Sebab menurutnya, hal itu di luar kewenangannya.
"Ya saya kira itu urusan pak Mendagri (Menteri Dalam Negeri, Tito Karnavian). Saya tak mau masuk terlalu dalam di sana. Saya kira Mendagri sudah lakukan komunikasi. Saya meyakini pak Mendagri bisa mengatasi itu, karena dia gubernur. Kalau olahraga saya serahkan kepada PSSI," ujar Zainudin di Kantor Kemenpora, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11).

Menpora and PSSI Comments on the Actions of the Governor of Central Kalimantan
05 Nov 2019, 01:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Central Kalimantan (Kalteng) Governor Sugianto Sabran's actions were not commendable while watching the match between Kalteng Putra against Persib Bandung in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 which was broadcast by Indosiar at Tuah Pahoe Stadium on Friday (1/11). At that time, he threw a drink bottle toward the field.
The action was carried out by Sugianto because he was disappointed with the decision of referee Abdul Rahman Salasa who gave a red card to the Kalteng Putra player, Patrich Wanggai. Do not stop there, Sugianto also scolded Palangkaraya Police Chief, AKBP Timbul Siregar for giving a warning to him after throwing the bottle.
When asked for comment about Sugianto's actions, the Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora), Zainudin Amali, did not say much. Because according to him, it was outside his authority.
"Yes, I think it is the affairs of the Minister of Home Affairs (Minister of the Interior, Tito Karnavian). I don't want to go in too deep there. I think the Minister of Home Affairs has done communication. I believe the Minister of Home Affairs can handle that, because he is the governor. PSSI, "Zainudin said at the Kemenpora Office, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (4/11).
